Interface MessageReconstructor

All Known Implementing Classes:
HttpMessageReconstructor, Tn3270MessageReconstructor
public interface MessageReconstructor
Port responsible for reconstructing protocol messages from ordered TCP byte streams.

Implementations are stateful and generally single-threaded.

Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<MessageEvent>
    onBytes(ByteStream slice)
    Consumes a contiguous byte slice and emits zero or more protocol message events.
    void
    onClose()
    Releases resources at the end of the session.
    void
    onStart()
    Prepares the reconstructor for a new session.

  • Method Details

    • onStart

      void onStart()
      Prepares the reconstructor for a new session.
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc

    • onBytes

      List<MessageEvent> onBytes(ByteStream slice) throws Exception
      Consumes a contiguous byte slice and emits zero or more protocol message events.
      Parameters:
      slice - byte stream slice with flow metadata
      Returns:
      ordered message events extracted from the slice; may be empty
      Throws:
      Exception - if parsing fails
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc

    • onClose

      void onClose()
      Releases resources at the end of the session.
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc
